name: Plugins A to Z
author: Lutz Schröer

sections.description: If you have a lot of plugins installed and want to scroll to a certain plugin it’s quite tedious to use the mouse wheel or the scroll bar. With this plugin you can jump to the first plugin with the same first letter as the plugin you want to see. Nice time saver.
sections.installation:
Install via WordPress’ “add plugin” feature or download it from wordpress.org and copy the file’s content into your
plugin directory.

In the settings you can switch between “short” and “long” display of the letters (see screenshots).
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Plugin works again after table’s new layout (2017-11-21)

1.01

  • Added uninstall routine

1.0

  • Initial release.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Install via WordPress’ “add plugin” feature or download it from wordpress.org and copy the file’s content into your
plugin directory.

In the settings you can switch between “short” and “long” display of the letters (see screenshots).

short_description: Quick access to entries in the plugins list.
description: If you have a lot of plugins installed and want to scroll to a certain plugin it’s quite tedious to use the mouse wheel or the scroll bar. With this plugin you can jump to the first plugin with the same first letter as the plugin you want to see. Nice time saver.

screenshots.caption: Displaying only the first letters for the installed plugins.
Wordpress < v4.3 is sorting special charcters in a different way.
